function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"The recent outbreak of COVID-19 has endangered the health of the world's population and has hampered the global economy.","Impact":"Potential loss of life and economic downturn if the spread is not controlled.","Mitigation":"Implement strict measures for disease control and invest in medical infrastructure and research.","Technologies":"Vaccines, testing technologies, and contact tracing apps.","People":"Global population, healthcare workers, and essential workers.","Owner":"Governments, healthcare organizations, and medical researchers."},{"Description":"Disruptions and closure of different sectors, including farms, production plants, logistics facilities, and transportation, is unprecedented worldwide.","Impact":"Decrease in supply chain efficiency, potential scarcity of goods, and economic impact on businesses.","Mitigation":"Develop contingency plans, invest in alternative transportation methods, and optimize inventory management.","Technologies":"Supply chain management software, AI for demand forecasting, and alternative transportation technologies.","People":"Supply chain managers, logistics operators, and businesses.","Owner":"Supply chain managers, logistics companies, and businesses."},{"Description":"Mandatory collective isolation (i.e. 'social distancing') has impacted consumer behavior and economic sectors.","Impact":"Reduction in in-person consumer activity, shift to online purchasing, and economic strain on certain industries.","Mitigation":"Promote e-commerce, implement safety measures for in-person transactions, and provide financial support to affected industries.","Technologies":"E-commerce platforms, contactless payment systems, and remote working technologies.","People":"Consumers, retail workers, and service industry employees.","Owner":"E-commerce companies, retail businesses, and government agencies."}]}
